plot: We often don't know the people that are very close to us. Sometimes, we have something that lives inside our own soul, hidden. It comes out from time to time. Sometimes, we are in conflict ...
title: Araler Antorale: The Inside Story
plot_es: We often don't know the people that are very close to us. Sometimes, we have something that lives inside our own soul, hidden. It comes out from time to time. Sometimes, we are in conflict ...
plot_en: We often don't know the people that are very close to us. Sometimes, we have something that lives inside our own soul, hidden. It comes out from time to time. Sometimes, we are in conflict ...
